summary: A dachshund passes from oddball owner to oddball owner, whose radically dysfunctional lives are all impacted by the pooch.
cast: Keaton Nigel Cooke|Tracy Letts|Julie Delpy|Greta Gerwig|Kieran Culkin|Rigoberto Garcia|Haraldo Alvarez|Dain Victorianio|Connor Long|Bridget Brown|Curran Connor|Charlie Tahan|Danny DeVito|Patrick Carroll Jr.|Molly Gay|Tyler Maynard|Devin Druid|Sharon Washington|Andrew Pang|Trey Silver|Samrat Chakrabarti|Anna Baryshnikov|Ari Graynor|Kett Turton|Trey Gerrald|Clara Mamet|Katherine Reis|Alexis Suarez|Steven Ted Beckler|Ellen Burstyn|Marcella Lowery|Zosia Mamet|Michael James Shaw|Melo Ludwig|Roger Brenner|Scott Martin|Jen Ponton
title: Wiener-Dog
